query.name: findAllByDefinition
query.sql: SELECT * FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF Where study_event_definition_id=? order by ordinal asc

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF SET STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID=?,STUDY_ID=?,CRF_ID=?, REQUIRED_CRF=?, DOUBLE_ENTRY=?,REQUIRE_ALL_TEXT_FILLED=?,DECISION_CONDITIONS=?, NULL_VALUES=?,DEFAULT_VERSION_ID=?,STATUS_ID=?,DATE_UPDATED=?,UPDATE_ID=?, ordinal=?,ELECTRONIC_SIGNATURE=?, HIDE_CRF=? WHERE EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF_ID=?

query.name: findAllByEventDefinitionId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM event_definition_crf WHERE study_event_definition_id=? order by ordinal asc

query.name: findAllActiveByEventDefinitionId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM event_definition_crf WHERE study_event_definition_id=? and status_id=1 order by ordinal asc

query.name: findByStudyEventIdAndCRFVersionId
query.sql: SELECT EDC.* FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF EDC, STUDY_EVENT SE, CRF_VERSION CV WHERE EDC.study_event_definition_id=SE.study_event_definition_id AND EDC.crf_id = CV.crf_id AND SE.study_event_id = ? AND CV.crf_version_id = ?

query.name: isRequiredInDefinition
query.sql: select distinct event_definition_crf.required_crf from event_definition_crf, event_crf, crf_version, study_event where crf_version.crf_version_id = ? and crf_version.crf_version_id = event_crf.crf_version_id and crf_version.crf_id = event_definition_crf.crf_id and event_definition_crf.study_event_definition_id = study_event.study_event_definition_id and study_event.study_event_id = ?

query.name: findByStudyEventDefinitionIdAndCRFId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF WHERE study_event_definition_id = ? AND crf_id = ?
